FuncDef:
The local-backup enable command enables the backup of local user information.
The undo local-backup enable command disables the backup of local user information.
By default, the backup of local user information is enabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Backup of local user information is enabled by default. This function can be enabled and disabled using the local-backup enable command and its undo form, respectively.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
